title: Build a Periodic Table Database
description: This is one of the required projects to earn your certification. For this project, you will create Bash a script to get information about chemical elements from a periodic table database.
instructions: Important: After you pass all the project tests, save a dump of your database into a periodic_table.sql file, as well as your element.sh file, so you can complete step 2. There will be instructions on how to do that within the virtual machine.
